page.title: 07RELIGION
page.content: {1.ST.JOHN BAPTIST CHURCH. This is a Church in Wales church.It comes under the parish of Afan Vale, there are four churches in the parish and there are two full-time clergy. The church holds two services every Sunday with an average attendance of 20 at each. {2.GLYNCORRWG METHODIST CHURCH. This church has no full-time clergy. There is one service every Sunday and the average attendance is sixteen. {3.CARMEL CALVANISTIC METHODIST CHURCH. No full-time clergy and services are held twice every Sunday. Average attendance is twelve at each service. {4.BETHEL BAPTIST CHAPEL. No full-time clergy and only one service every Sunday with an average attendance of sixteen.
